attributes.action: Get government to provide full financing for this organisation
attributes.additional_details: This organisation has relied on donations when government should provide it
attributes.background: Fully fund this charity under the military covenant

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions calling for the Government to provide funding to specific individual charities or organisations, and in any case it is not clear which charity you want to be given funding.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to make funding available for all charities that work with a specified group of people, such as military veterans, if that is something you'd like to happen.
